F.A.Q.

How does this work?

Learn from each input or comment on pages and be summarized as part of all other articles used. Our system aggregates feedback from multiple sources to provide comprehensive learning materials.

What is the course duration?

Courses range from 4 to 12 weeks depending on the program. Each course includes weekly sessions, practical assignments, and personalized feedback from instructors.

Can I access materials after completion?

Yes, all course materials remain accessible after completion. You'll also receive updates to content for one year after your course ends at no additional cost.

Is there a certification?

Upon successful completion, you'll receive a professional certification that is recognized internationally in the smiling industry. Our graduates have gone on to work with top brands worldwide.
